name: Warrior Archery Master: The Battle Of Revenge
name_original: Warrior Archery Master: The Battle Of Revenge
description:
Take a leap into the medieval era and protect your kingdom from the rival army troops in the battle of archers to be fought in the wild winter snow forests in Warrior Archery Master: The Battle of Revenge. As a prince, master the art of archery and show your skills in the most difficult and hard battles you have to fight for your people and for your land!
In Warrior Archery Master: The Battle of Revenge, you will be playing as a brave prince in the medieval era empire and protect your land from that transgression enemies who attacked your kingdom, take your land and start killing your people. Now it’s payback time! Take your horse, bow and arrow to lead your troops to fight back in the hard snowy weathers and take the long pending revenge and get back which is yours.
The wait is over for the most challenging and non-stop thrilling archery battles action and download Warrior Archery Master: The Battle of Revenge and become brave king of your land. Your people is looking towards you to stand up, fight back and become the legendary knight in the face of history!
Game Features:
1) Amazing battle field and old era graphics
2) Challenging and Action Pack Archery Battles
3) Smooth & Friendly User Interface & Controls
